transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Uh sir very good evening. This is Ranjit calling from IndiaMART head office Noida. How are you?
Customer: Yes, I am fine.
Executive: Uh sir this call is regarding your complaint. Uh I recently received your complaint and you mentioned that someone uh make some unnecessary changes in your product pricing without your consent, right? So you write a mail. Uh so I just wanted to know what the issues you are facing like right. I am checking in the history here. Someone connected to you yesterday from our team. Uh like you like yesterday you discussed with Pravesh Sharma. And uh now you have mentioned that someone changed your product pricing. So can I know the what the major changes done by uh our team or someone in your catalog so we can correct that. If he is the online, I will connect you with the concerned person.
Customer: Okay, you are not the concerned person, right?
Executive: I am the owner. If you want.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Okay. And the IndiaMART and request will be handled by my team. I will just connect you with the concerned person.
Customer: Yeah, sure sir. I am on call, sir. Yeah, please.
(silence)
The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Neevu matanaduttiruva vyaktiyu nimma kareyannu hold nalli ittiddare. Dayavittu line nalliye iri.
(silence)
Ap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne apki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold.
(silence)
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Uh yes sir very good evening. This is Ranjit calling from IndiaMART head office Noida. This call is regarding your complaint. We have received a complaint from your side and we mentioned that uh in your catalog some changes was made by our team yesterday, right? Without your consent.
Customer: Yes, that's it.
Executive: So I am your account manager and I am managing your account here. And I have not called you yet. We are discussing first time here. And I am checking the history. Your discussion was done with Pravesh Sharma today. Right? So uh uh yeah. So I am checking here nothing changes was done uh by our team. Uh so but you have mentioned that the prices was updated. So can I know which product prices was updated by our team? So we can correct the same again. And I will also guide you to like uh uh do some needful here so from in future no one will uh make any changes without your consent.
Customer: Okay. So this morning uh who was the person I spoke to?
Executive: Uh it was Pravesh Sharma.
Customer: Yeah, Pravesh Sharma, he confirmed that there was a change made by Aarti yesterday from your team which you are denying now. Right? That's the first point.
Executive: Uh sorry. Yeah, yeah, sorry, sorry. I am really sorry for that. I just checked her comment and he has mentioned that uh like prices was changed by Aarti Raghav, yeah from production team. Correct, sir.
Customer: So that is the problem. That is the issue I am calling about because I didn't hear anything back from you after I spoke to Praveen, right? So what has been made? What is the what is the solution about it or what is the resolution?
Executive: Uh so sir uh from next time no one will change you anything in your catalog without your consent. As of now I am here to like correct the details whatever the changes was made by our production team. Okay, so we will correct that. Yeah. So I just wanted to know which details you want to change or modify again.
Customer: Now we need to change the prices for sure because we will not be able to uh justify those prices from our side.
Executive: Okay. So you have only 14 product right now. So I am just telling you the product name and their prices and you just tell me the correct price. I will uh update uh like right now. Okay, so the first product is 40 uh by 40 into 28 centimeter teak natural serving wooden platter and the prices is mentioned here is 600 per pieces.
Customer: Can you please open the IndiaMART website?
Executive: Yeah.
Customer: No, first thing what you need to understand is uh who has access to IndiaMART because we keep changing things, right? And then someone else updates it. So there is no point of this discussion until unless we get a confirmation that the content has been now freezed and no further changes will be made. So this has been happening for number of times. So now I am discussing with you. Tomorrow someone should not come and update it, right? So there is no point of this discussion if we are changing something tomorrow without our consent. Okay? So one thing what I would like you to do is you will change the price from our side, that's fine. So when you go to uh the whitesales.com.
Customer: Uh huh.
Customer: And when you go to about us, can you go to the whitesales.com? This was a website that you guys made, right?
Executive: Yeah.
Customer: So go to the uh just below the home, there is something called as about us.
Executive: Yeah, sir.
Customer: So if you go there, uh about us it is mentioned wrongly as we were established in the year 2022.
Executive: Yeah, here mentioned is established in the year 2020 with the white sales corporation or manufacturer and retailer.
Customer: We we are established in 2012.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: So that content has to be updated. So you can you help us with that?
Executive: Yeah, sir. So I am updating it from my end. And if you want you can also make make changes from your end as well. I can guide you guide you.
Customer: No, we are not able to make changes to that. We have changed uh everything else. So we are not able to see where this is coming from. So right now you want to change it?
Customer: Yes, make it 2012.
Executive: Okay. You want to make it uh like 2012. Okay, just uh have you opened your website right now? Like IndiaMART uh uh have you log in of IndiaMART website? Profile.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Okay. So just click on profile section.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Uh in profile section uh the first option is profile details. Uh then you are getting the additional details options there. Website pages, editing details. So uh you want to change the about us pages. So you have to click on website page firstly.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: After that you are getting homepage options and the second one is about us. Okay, so you want to make change in about us section. So just click on about us.
Customer: Yeah, it is now nowhere mentioned 2022 here. That's what the reason we are asking you guys to make that change.
Executive: Yeah, so now it's mentioned 2012.
Customer: That was the update that was made by Aarti and she has made it wrongly and we are not able to correct it.
Executive: Okay, but in this system.
Executive: Yeah, yeah, but now it's updated 2012, right?
Customer: No, it's not reflecting in the the whitesales.com. That's what I am saying.
Executive: Yeah, it's not not reflecting on your website currently. So it might be like uh this details has been like uh recently changes recently made by our team. So it will take some time to get it approved by our backend team. So it may be uh uh like correct details will be uh reflected on your site from tomorrow onwards after like within 24 hours.
Customer: No, just no, this has been there since last week. Okay? We have been trying to update this. Yes, we have been trying we have updated all other pages which was wrongly mentioned. We were able to fix all the issues from our side which we spend enough hours to make the changes according to our business portfolio, right?
Executive: Yeah, correct.
Customer: But on this about us, it's not updating at all. So I don't know where this data is coming from. So I need your help to fix this about us on the whitesales.com.
Executive: Okay, so the first thing is about us page I have to update and we have to change the establishment year that is 2012 to 2000 sorry 2022 to 2012. Apart from this, is there any changes you wanted to do in your uh like profile in your website?
Customer: No, we will change the price. We will change the price now that we will handle. Just change this about us on the whitesales.com from 2022 to 2012.
Executive: Yeah, correct. I will I am just updating this and once uh this uh like details uh are getting reflected on your sites uh I will connect you and will inform you the same. Okay, uh you will be getting a calls tomorrow from my side and for the pricing parts and another details says like no one will make any changes uh in your profile from now onwards without your consent, okay? For this you can do one thing. Uh you have to just click on setting option.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Uh in setting options uh just hold on. One options is there you can just hold on for a while, sir.
(silence)
Executive: Uh in notice in just click on account setting options.
Customer: Mhm.
Executive: You are getting one options there just scroll it down and just try to like see if there any options catalog modification permission. You have to just click on disable that.
Customer: Okay, I think uh we got the OTP. should have received the OTP.
Executive: Sorry?
Executive: 1545.
(silence)
Customer: Okay, so that is disabled. Uh does it mean you cannot change uh the content as well? Because you need to change it from 2020 to 2012, right?
Executive: No sir, I can make it change because I have admin access. But whenever someone is going to change like do any changes in your profile now, so you will be getting the notification and if anyone like opening your admin access uh at our level at IndiaMART level, so they will see the pop up uh on their screen that client has disabled modification on his catalog. Please contact client before making any modifications, okay? So our team will be like our team will contact you before making any changes. No one will make any changes without your consent.
Customer: Okay. Okay, sir. And it it has been done because it may be your profile uh recently like live on our portal uh in maximizer services. So our production team make this changes. Uh but from now onwards, I am the only person in IndiaMART who who will be handling your profile. So no one will make any changes before your consent and I am all uh I am only will be the concerned person for your profile, okay, sir? So if you face any kind of issues problem related to your services, you will need to just contact to me only.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Yeah. So I am sending you my uh WhatsApp number on I am just texting you on your WhatsApp. Just save my number. My name is Ranjit Singh. And if you face any kind of issues related to your services, you just text me on WhatsApp or you can also call me back on the same number. So this is your like this is the number you are using or I think this is the number of Mr. Abhilash, right?
Customer: Yes, so you can WhatsApp a message and we will add you to the group.
Executive: Okay, just tell me your number. I will text you here.
Customer: Yeah, we will add it to the group, that's fine. I think uh Shubham, we are talking to Shubham Thakur.
Executive: No, no. Uh I just I I have to called on the number mention here starting starting from 94 and the last three digit is 22. So I am calling you on this number.
Customer: Now what is your number? I can it myself.
Executive: Uh my number is 8700.
Customer: 8700.
Executive: 55
Customer: 55
Executive: 2755
Customer: 2755
Executive: Yeah, sir.
Customer: 8700 55 2755
Executive: 55
Executive: Yeah, so this is my number. Uh and uh uh if you have like raised the mail now, so I got a ticket here. So firstly I am updating your details correctly here. Once I will update the details then I will close the ticket and you will be getting a feedback uh mail on your WhatsApp on your registered mail ID. So just mark that feedback as satisfied once uh like details has been corrected, okay, sir? I will close uh your ticket only after the making the correct details, okay?
Customer: Yeah, okay.
Executive: So I think you have been invited uh into the WhatsApp group. Please accept it.
Customer: Yeah, yeah, I got it. I got it and I have joined the group.
Executive: Okay, sir. Thank you so much. Thank you for your time.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Product pricing changed without consent.

- Unable to change the establishment year on website.

- Wants to prevent unauthorized catalog modifications.



Resolution:

- Agreed to correct the establishment year.

- Guided to disable catalog modification permission.

- Executive shared WhatsApp number for direct contact.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update details and inform customer.

- Customer will receive a call next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, modification, website, pricing, consent
